snippet: The city of Portland, Ore., said it had started divesting itself of holdings in the retail store because of its labor practices.
abstract: City of Portland, Ore, announces it has begun divesting itself of its holdings in Walmart; cites concerns over company's ethics and labor practices, which it says do not align with city's progressive values.
lead_paragraph: The city of Portland, Ore., said it had started divesting itself of holdings in the retail store because of its labor practices.

headline.main: Portland, Ore., Sheds Its Walmart Bonds
headline.print_headline: Portland, Ore., Sheds Its Walmart Bonds
